user_query: I'm planning a trip to New York City and I want to explore the city's historical events. Can you provide me with the historical events that occurred in New York City in the year 2020? Additionally, I would like to see the most recent 30 messages from the user 'zerobeta' on StockTwits.

TaskList.description: Retrieve historical events that occurred in New York City in the year 2020.
Fetch the most recent 30 messages from the user 'zerobeta' on StockTwits.
